page.title: 06LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The area is policed by the{Devon and {Cornwall Constabulary.}The Chief Constable is Donald Elliott Q.P.M. F.B.I.M. The approximate size of the entire force is 2734 men and women officers. Our area is served from{Exmouth {Police Station}which has{43 officers}8 of which are female. In addition there are{two panda cars and{a traffic car from Middlemoor (Exeter). There are no seasonal changes in these figures. { The most common crimes are theft from {property and vehicles. There was recently a hunt saboteur arrested at Woodbury and subsequently convicted. Special police attention and presence was required at a Scooter Rally 5th. 6th. 7th. July and (cont on p. 7)
